name: HELLSTREAM DX
description:
Fight Endless Demons in your Upgrade-able Mech to Save the World!

Every 10 Seconds... you have to pick an upgrade for you, or the demons! How long can you survive?

Controls are all listed in game!

 NOTE: This is a post-jam version, but the only changes are the following bug fixes and Quality-of-Life changes

  • Restarting the game no longer locks you out of upgrades you picked last run
  • 'Reload Speed' has been renamed to 'Firerate' for clarity
  •  Kill count now resets on restart
  • Game now randomizes each run (forgot to set random seed on run start)
  • Upgrades and Downgrades now display better on death screen (they won't flow over the right of the screen anymore)

Tools used:

  • Godot
  • Beepbox
  • Paint.net
  • Aseprite
  • Audacity

Everything by me except for:

Digital Font

https://www.1001fonts.com/digital-7-font.html

Bit Font
https://joebrogers.itch.io/bitpotion
